Dark Mode

Portfolio

Explore projects spanning integrated campaigns, editorial work, and visual storytelling.

The Culture Book

When the CEO of G Adventures wanted to bottle their famous and fearless corporate culture, I led the creation of their Culture Bible. This 144-page bound book translated their heart-on-sleeve values into a tangible keepsake. I shepherded the project from concept through writing, editing, and creative production, delivering a piece that matched the company's off-the-beaten-path vibe.

editorial writing

Annual Reports - Power of Tourism

As the writer and editor of Tourism Lethbridge Annual Reports, I translated data (from my marketing campaigns) into accessible narratives for diverse stakeholders like city politicians and local business leaders. In 2022 we reimagined the format entirely and distilled complex facts into an at-a-glance Power of Tourism format.

editorial writing strategy

Food Tourism

Lethbridge sits in the heart of one of Canada's agri-food powerhouses but wasn't capturing food tourism dollars. I spearheaded partnerships across DOMs, counties and provincial tourism bodies to develop a regional Ale Trail as well as food tourism products that transformed unique local agricultural highlights into exciting visitors experiences.

writing strategy

Lethbridge Experience Travel Guide

I directed the creation of Lethbridge's flagship travel guide. To make it happen, I collaborated with local attractions and internal designers to produce the destination's core tourism resource. The guide served double duty as a physical document distributed across Western Canada's travel centres and the foundation for much of our website and other digital content.

editorial writing

Lethbridge - Your UNESCO Hub

As COVID restrictions lifted, I developed an integrated campaign that positioned Lethbridge as the gateway to four UNESCO World Heritage Sites. This multi-channel effort - spanning outdoor advertising, digital ads, B2B print, email marketing and direct mail - amplified our presence at Rendez-Vous Canada, the country's signature international tourism marketplace.

writing strategy

Highway 3 Ale Trail

I capitalized on Alberta's booming craft beer scene by partnering with Medicine Hat Tourism and local breweries to create a market-ready ale trail product that stretched from Saskatchewan to British Columbia. We launched at Calgary's YYC Beer Fest with in-person activation and social media support, turning a regional asset into a sellable tourism experience.

writing strategy

Lethbridge - Detour From the Ordinary

As COVID travel restrictions eased, I launched Detour From the Ordinary to capture pent-up demand from Calgary and Edmonton travellers. The multi-platform campaign deployed Facebook and Google Display ads, email and direct mail, plus radio ads and interviews - all driving to a custom landing page that let us track offline conversion.

writing strategy

Alberta SouthWest Website

Alberta SouthWest's 15 community Regional Economic Development Alliance (REDA) needed a website overhaul to match their investor-focussed mandate. I led the content strategy and restructure, collaborating with a designer to transform an aging site into a clear, modern platform that improved readability for potential investors.

editorial writing strategy

G Adventures Catalogues

G Adventures' off-the-beaten-path adventures required vivid storytelling to help consumers imagine the experiences open to them. I wrote trip descriptions for their print catalogues and digital platforms across all continents, and led the language development and established the voice for their premium Discovery line rebrand.

writing

Epicure National Conference

Epicure's national convention was the company's annual rally for their salesforce. I scripted the entire multi-day event including executive speeches, jokes and daily programming, setting the tone and energy that kept hundreds of consultants engaged and motivated to sell. I wrote the poster announcement of the speaker line-up in a language designed to build anticipation.

writing

Epicure Sales Promotions

Direct-selling communications walks a tightrope - your salesforce is also your customer base. I crafted promotions for Epicure that blended B2B precision with B2C excitement, motivating consultants to both sell products and stock their own kitchens. Each piece balanced business opportunity with lifestyle appeal.

writing

Photography - Performance

I captured the raw energy of live performance for Tourism Lethbridge - from Sam Roberts Band's concert intensity to local theatre groups performing on stage. Drawing on my camera operator training, I delivered dynamic images that showcased the destination's entertainment offerings.

photography

Photography - Rodeo

I loved bringing viewers up close to the action with the sport photography I captured for Tourism Lethbridge at the Whoop-Up Days professional rodeo. Drawing on my camera operator training, I delivered dynamic images that showcased the destination's entertainment offerings.

photography

Photography - Travel

As a travel writer, I use photography to amplify my stories. Macro shots of rare flora and fauna convey the exotic, architectural images establish a sense of place, and candid street photography brings distant cultures to life for viewers thousands of kilometres away.

photography
